title: Steamroller

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -  Deal a Basic attack to a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  If you kill a non-Town player, you'll be able to attack one extra player the next night and your Attack value will be raised by one. If you continuously kill non-Town players each night, this will stack.
-  If you idle at night, your ability and Attack tier are returned to normal.
-  If you kill a Town player, you will be unable to shoot anyone the next night. Your ability and Attack tier are returned to normal.
-  If you kill two or more Town players in the same night, you will suicide from guilt the following night.
